price: Di: "¡Oh, Señor nuestro! Juzga con la verdad. Tú eres el Misericordioso, Aquel a quien recurrir contra lo que atribuyen [falsamente a Dios]".
arabic: قَٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi uḥ'kum bil-ḥaqi warabbunā al-raḥmānu al-mus'taʿānu ʿalā mā taṣifūna
translations: the One Whose help is sought
